::Scrat::

Jerking his hand away from Windlord and trembling uncontrollably, 
Scrat rolls up into as tight a ball as he could. It was all over. He 
knew they were gonna eat him. He could hear their voices, some of 
them friendly, but he was to scared to understand any of them.

"P-p-p-p-p-p-p-p-p," he stops attempting to speak, continuing to 
tremble in fear, but then tries again, "P-please d-don't hurt me...."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Trinity::
> 
> She turned and looked at Zeni. She put a paw on his shoulder. "It's 
> OK. I'll watch out for you."
